definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: seer;—abs. ´[[ח]] Am 7:12 + 7 t.; cstr. [[חׂוֵה]] 1Ch 21:9 + 3 t.; [[חוֹוֵה]] 2Ch 35:15; pl. [[חׂוִים]] Is 29:10 + 4 t.; [[חוֹזִים]] 2Ch 33:19 (so rd. with LXX; [[חוֹזׇי֑]] MT scribal error)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of unnamed persons, syn. ([[ים]])[[נבא]] 2Ki 17:13, Is 29:10; [[רׂאִים]] Is 30:10; [[קׂסְמִים]] Mic 3:7; historical writers [[דִּבְרֵי הַחׂוִים]] 2Ch 33:18, [[דברי חזזים]] (LXX) 2Ch 33:19 (MT appar. n. pr.)

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: named prophets; Gad 2Sa 24:11 = 1Ch 21:9, 1Ch 29:29, 2Ch 29:25; Amos Am 7:12; Iddo 2Ch 9:29, 2Ch 12:15; Jehu 2Ch 19:2.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: the singers: Heman 1Ch 25:5; Asaph 2Ch 29:30; Jeduthun 2Ch 35:15. Note—It seems best to add

vision (cf. [[רׂאֶה]] Is 28:7) [[עִם שְׁאוֹל עָשִׂינוּ חׂוֶה]] Is 28:15 with She’ôl we made a vision (had a vision, in connexion with She'ôl—i.e. by necromancy, v. Du—which makes us secure; ‖ [[כרת ברית אֶת־מָוֶת]]; Ew:§ 156 e trans. oracle here and 2Ki 17:13; Hoffm:ZAW iii. 95 puts this under

‘we have appointed a prophet with She’ôl (SS &ld;Ein bei der Scheol be-stellter Seher&rd;), who is answerable to us for it;’ LXX Vulgate Targum AV RV Che Di al., are at (or have made an) agreement (prophetic advice of seers being taken at time of making treaties; v. [[חָזוּת]]
